EditorData.NodeContext: Greeting needs to be empty. It's used to cut off this flow from the others

Text.Value: *Are there any doors that gold can't open? Perhaps, but not this one. You may enter as freely as you please.*
*Your pockets lightened, you are permitted to enter.*
*Trespassing? What trespassing? You were always welcome here.*
Try to buy your way in. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_2_463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Gain permanent access to the trespassing area
EditorData.logicalname: Trespass, expensive bribe to get permanent access

Text.Value: All right, I'll go.
I know the drill. I'm going.
Back the way I came, right?
*You have outstayed your already flimsy welcome, and now - you will leave.*
*A valiant but misguided attempt. You will leave this area now.*
*The only thing you've managed to convince them of is that you absolutely do not belong here.*
Right - I'll be on my way.
So sorry. I thought this was the way to the latrines. I'll be off then.
My humble apologies. I shall remove myself immediately.
*It's wise to check the content of your purse before offering it to others.*
*It's customary to possess gold in order to bribe someone with it.*
*You don't have the gold to buy your way out of this situation.*
*You've been caught trespassing. Again.*
*You've been seen re-entering a forbidden area. Apparently it's becoming rather tiresome.*
*It seems the rules have not changed in your absence. You're still trespassing.*

EditorData.logicalname: Attack, think they can handle you

Text.Value: *You've crossed the wrong threshold. The guards will deal with you.*
*This is a restricted area. You sense the guards might be about to join you.*
*The only thing more foolish than trespassing here is getting caught. You're being reported.*
*You've wandered into a forbidden area. You sense it might be time to leave.*
*You've set foot in a restricted area. A swift exit may be in order.*
*You don't have permission to be here. You're about to be ejected.*
Just a quick look around won't hurt anyone. You won't even know I was there.
Look at me - do I look dangerous?
I'm here, aren't I? You wouldn't have let me in if I didn't belong, would you?
I'm here for a routine inspection. I'm sure your superiors will be very interested to know that you tried to deny me entry.
This is my place now. If you don't leave now, you won't leave at all.
That uniform of yours will make a very tasteful bodybag, if you don't get out of my way.
Try to convince them you belong here.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Only for trespassing, harder persuasion checks than talking your way out of it

Text.Value: It's me - your old friend [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]! You wouldn't shut the door on a friend, would you?
I've been sent to join the patrol, there have been reports of someone trying to sneak in.
Why are you looking at me like that? I live here.
*You sense it was a mistake to enter here without permission. Possibly a fatal one.*
*You've been caught trespassing. You're about to be taught a very painful lesson.*
*This area is strictly off-limits. It seems you're about to learn that the hard way.*
Attack.

EditorData.logicalname: Attack, think they can handle you

Text.Value: *You managed to talk your way in - no easy feat.*
*You've been granted free passage. What you do with that privilege is up to you.*
*Congratulations - you've convinced them to give you access. Now what?*

Synopsis: A player got spotted by an NPC as they were trespassing.
